item.title: Agile CSS development with Compass/SASS
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: CSS is not a complete language, it misses variables, functions, nesting, partials and math. SASS makes easy to create CSS for complex sites. Compass allows you to do easy spriting, easier debugging, and more. In this speech I’ll show you the main features of SASS, Compass, how to install it, and why you will never […]
item.content:encoded: CSS is not a complete language, it misses variables, functions, nesting, partials and math. SASS makes easy to create CSS for complex sites. Compass allows you to do easy spriting, easier debugging, and more. In this speech I’ll show you the main features of SASS, Compass, how to install it, and why you will never ever create any other site without it.
